short_summary: High speed imager, control laptop, and accessories. Preference is given to bidders with a Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies unless Holders of this Supply Arrangement occupy all preferential slots (Paragraph 9.5.8).
description: The request is reserved for Holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI only. The purpose of this notice is to invite suppliers to bid on an additional procurement through the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI under the category of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP): High Speed Imager, Control Laptop, and Accessories

## Overview

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued by the Department of National Defence for the procurement of a high-speed imager, control laptop, and accessories. This RFP is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI who are already pre-qualified to provide laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, services, and supplies.

## Objectives

The primary objectives of this RFP are to acquire a high-speed imager, control laptop, and accessories to support research and development activities within the Department of National Defence. The items to be procured are:

*   High-speed imager
*   Control laptop
*   Accessories (to be specified in the solicitation document)

## Key Dates

*   Publication Date: January 11, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2023, at 14:00 (local time)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Upon contract award
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

## Tender Evaluation

## Mandatory Technical Criteria

*   The bidder must be a holder of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI
*   The bidder must meet the mandatory technical criteria as specified in the solicitation document

## Evaluation Method

The bidder who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   Rose, Marie-Claude
*   Phone: 418-844-4000
*   Email: marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca

## Instructions for Bidder Registration

*   Interested suppliers should register on Buyandsell.gc.ca and download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C.
*   Suppliers must submit a response to the RFP as per the requirements specified in the solicitation document.
